basic_info.description: is a Software Engineer with exceptional performance in full software development lifecycle and upgrades. Working closely with clients to establish problem specifications and system designs. Manages design effort and guides installation process for on-schedule product launches. Demonstrates high aptitude, dedicated to growth in the technology field, and motivated to channel creativity. In addition to software development, I have interests in fashion, personal development, and videography.

projects.title: Odd Ducks
projects.description: Odd Duck Product Co is trying to decide which project from their R&D department they should invest in next to sell. They asked you to make a web page that they can run at a kiosk at the front entrance of their campus. Whenever an employee walks by, the employee can vote for 1 of the 3 products displayed that they think should be the next new product brought to market. After a week of collecting data, they would like some nice graphs to visualize the results.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Patâ€™s Salmon Cookies needs a proof of concept application to calculate the number of cookies each location must make every day so it can manage its supplies inventory and baking schedule. The number of cookies to make depends on the hours of operation, the minimum number of customers per hour, the maximum number of customers per hour, and the average number of cookies purchased per customer are to be displayed in a table on a sales page while information about Salmon Cookies is to display on the home page.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
